solutions.title: AI Security,
solutions.description: The rise of Generative AI brings enormous opportunity—and unprecedented risks. We deliver a complete platform to test, monitor, and defend your AI systems.

redTeaming.title: AI Red Teaming
redTeaming.description: Stress-test models against jailbreaks, prompt injection, and adversarial attacks.

runtimeProtection.title: AI Runtime Security
runtimeProtection.description: Filter and monitor inputs/outputs in real time to prevent abuse and data leaks.

agenticSecurity.title: AI Agentic Scanning
agenticSecurity.description: Safeguard multi-agent workflows from indirect prompt injection and chaining.

compliance.title: Compliance Monitoring
compliance.description: Map AI risks to NCA ECC and PDPL. Automate evidence and reporting.

smes.title: SMEs

hero.title: Secure The Code,
hero.description: We protect organizations from the new frontier of risks in AI and cybersecurity. From LLM red teaming to runtime defenses, Aynigma Guard makes AI adoption safe, compliant, and resilient.
